title: Palworld is Steam Deck Playable and runs on Desktop Linux with Proton
description: Palworld is a new release on Steam in Early Access from Pocketpair. A fusion of Pokémon with monster catching, farming, building and much more. It is Steam Deck Playable and does work on Desktop Linux too.

title: VCMI, open-source engine for Heroes of Might and Magic III v1.4.3 brings lots of bug fixes
description: If you want to play the classic Heroes of Might and Magic III, the open source engine VCMI is easily the best way on modern platforms and version 1.4.3 is out now with plenty of bug fixes.

title: Steam Beta adds explainers to Steam Deck performance menu - plus fixes for Desktop too
description: Valve has released a new Beta for the Steam Deck and Steam Desktop that improved numerous bugs, and for Steam Deck makes the performance menu a little easier to understand.
